title: Kingdom Hearts: Final Mix
description: Remaster of of Kingdom Hearts I with added content. Was released in Japan first in 2002 because a lot of the original assets for Kingdom Hearts were lost. The game was re-released in 2013 as part of the Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 ReMIX Collection.

title: Kingdom Hearts Re:Chain of Memories
description: Console remake of Kingdom Hearts Chain of Memories with added content. In Japan, it was released as part of the Kingdom Hearts II: Final Mix compilation on the PlayStation 2. It was later re-released in 2013 as part of the Kingdom Hearts 1.5 ReMIX Collection.

title: Kingdom Hearts 2: Final Mix
description: Was originally a Japan-only title that included the Kingdom Hearts II remaster (with additional content) as well as Re:Chain of Memories. It was later re-released as part of the Kingdom Hearts 2.5 ReMIX Collection.

title: Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days HD
description: 2 hours and 50 minutes of fully-voiced, high definition cutscenes based on the original game. A fully playable remake was originally planned, but Square Enix was running out of time prior to the release of Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 ReMIX.

title: Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep: Final Mix
description: A remaster of Birth by Sleep with additional content. It was later re-released as part of the Kingdom Hearts 2.5 HD ReMIX Collection.

title: Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded HD
description: 3 hours of fully-voiced, high definition cutscenes based on the original game. In this compilation some more scenes were added to connect more of the games such as Union χ and Dream Drop Distance.

title: Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance HD
description: HD Remaster of Dream Drop Distance with Quality-of-Life changes.
